title: Lagging in game but ping still fine
body: I keep having random lag spikes, and when i say that its weird becuase the ping in my game dosent actually increase you can just see the lag. Like abilities will cast 2 seconds later and movement will not turn for a few movements after clicking. I closed almost all background programs except what windows needs to run and made sure no one else was using the internet at the time. I called my cable company and they said everything is fine on their end. What do you guys think? Help please? :(

replies.body: It sounds like you're having input delays which can happen from network problems like packet loss.  Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection to the game servers.  The issue may be more local if your ISP suggest things are fine-- unless its routing to the game server has changed.  The guide should do the trick.

i am having the same issue. i play just fine then all of a sudden my champ is stuck and i cannot cast any abilities. few seconds later it goes back to normal. no ping spikes, fps drops or anything else. no lag on any other games either.
